Articles.Content:
So, I started streaming KSP 2 this week. I have two streams under my belt now in which I first put a satellite, then an unkerballed rocket and later several crewed pods into orbit. Despite all the bugs, I only lost one kerbal in the process. RIP Bill.

I've been designing NASA-style mission patches for these streams and wanted to share them with the community:

I will be making more. I am currently working on a patch for my third mission to put a kerbal into orbit around the mun and then get him back home.
